verses.verse: These are the inheritances which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> distributed to them, <S%H5157><s%>

by the lot <S%H1486><s%> of their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> for the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes, <S%H4294><s%> and for the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe. <S%H4294><s%>

For Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> but to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among them. <S%H8432><s%>

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tribes, <S%H4294><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> and they gave <S%H5414><s%> no portion <S%H2506><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> except cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in, <S%H4054><s%> with their suburbs for their livestock <S%H4735><s%> and for their property. <S%H7075><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and they divided <S%H2505><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> drew <S%H5066><s%> near to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3045><s%> "You know the thing <S%H1697><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> concerning me <S%H182><s%> and concerning you <S%H182><s%> in Kadesh Barnea. <S%H6947><s%>

I was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me from Kadesh Barnea <S%H6947><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%> I brought <S%H7725><s%> him word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> as it was in my heart. <S%H3824><s%>

Nevertheless, <S%H251><s%> my brothers who went up <S%H5927><s%> with me made the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> melt; <S%H4529><s%> but I wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H776><s%> 'Surely the land where you <S%H7272><s%> walked <S%H1869><s%> shall be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to you and to your children <S%H1121><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> because you have wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>'

"Now, <S%H3068><s%> behold, Yahweh has kept me alive, <S%H2421><s%> as he spoke, <S%H1696><s%> these forty-five <S%H705><s%> <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> from the time <S%H227><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> while Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> Now, <S%H8084><s%> behold, I am eighty-five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> today. <S%H3117><s%>

As yet I am as strong <S%H2389><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> as I was in the day <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me: <S%H3581><s%> as my strength was then, <S%H3581><s%> even so is my strength now for war, <S%H4421><s%> to go out <S%H3318><s%> and to come in. <S%H935><s%>

Now therefore give <S%H5414><s%> me this hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H3068><s%> of which Yahweh spoke <S%H1696><s%> in that day; <S%H3117><s%> for you heard <S%H8085><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> how the Anakim <S%H6062><s%> were there, <S%H1419><s%> and great and fortified <S%H1219><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%> It may be <S%H194><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be with <S%H854><s%> me, <S%H3423><s%> and I shall drive them out, as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke. <S%H1696><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him; <S%H5414><s%> and he gave Hebron <S%H2275><s%> to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

Therefore Hebron <S%H2275><s%> became the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> to this day; <S%H3117><s%> because he wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath Arba, <S%H7153><s%> after the greatest <S%H1419><s%> man <S%H120><s%> among the Anakim. <S%H6062><s%> The land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> from war. <S%H4421><s%>
